description:
After Kirino is brought back from her study abroad in America by Kyousuke, she spends time getting back into her normal routine as she surrounds herself with Aragaki Ayase and other friends who are excited to see her back. In contrast to that, Kyousuke is feeling dissatisfied with the fact that Kirino is ignoring him like she used to before their last year together. So Kirino responds by...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma petite sœur n`est pas censée revenir
My Little Sister Can`t Come Back Home Again
Ore no Imouto ga Futatabi Kaettekuru Wake ga Nai
俺の妹が再び帰ってくるわけがない
